item.title: Hong Kong SFC's Thomas Atkinson: Beware of Stablecoin Hype, High Risks of Unlicensed Trading Platforms
item.description: August 18th. Terence Yeung, the Executive Director of the Intermediaries Division of the Hong Kong Securities and Futures Commission, stated that recently, some companies have been manipulating stock prices under the guise of applying for a stablecoin license. Investors are advised to remain rational and be vigilant against related scams.He disclosed that the division received 265 complaints related to virtual asset trading in the first half of this year, mainly concerning overseas fraud, platform infringement, or fund freezing. He also cautioned about the risks of trading on unlicensed platforms. (FX678)

item.title: PLUME Surges Above $0.1, Up Over 9% in 24 Hours
item.description: On August 18th, based on HTX market data, PLUME surged past $0.1 and is currently trading at $0.1077, with a 24-hour increase of 9.53%.

item.title: Binance HODLer Airdrop Launches for Plume (PLUME)
item.description: August 18th. According to an official announcement, the Binance HODLer Airdrop has now initiated the 32nd project - Plume (PLUME), a blockchain designed for Real World Assets (RWA) and compatible with the EVM. From July 24, 2025, at 08:00 to July 28, 2025, at 07:59 (UTC+8), users who used BNB to subscribe to Yield Farming Coins (fixed-term and/or flexible-term) or on-chain yield farming products will receive an airdrop allocation. The HODLer Airdrop information is expected to become available within 24 hours, and the new tokens will be delivered to users' spot wallets at least 1 hour before trading commences.Binance will list PLUME on August 18, 2025, at 23:00 (UTC+8) and open trading pairs for USDT, USDC, BNB, FDUSD, and TRY in accordance with the Seed Label Trading Rules. The PLUME deposit channel will open on August 18, 2025, at 19:30 (UTC+8).

item.title: A whale has added to their position in the past 2 hours, acquiring 79.34 WBTC and 1860 ETH, with a total value of $17.08 million.
item.description: On August 18th, as per on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), a whale has withdrawn 79.34 WBTC and 1860 ETH from a trading platform during a downtrend in the past 2 hours. The total value of these withdrawals is $17.08 million, and there is suspicion of bottom fishing.Currently, the address holds assets worth $153 million, which includes both BTC and ETH, and both were withdrawn from exchanges in the past week.

item.title: Binance C2C "Curated" Zone is officially live, offering zero fees for a limited time and launching an iPhone 17 lucky draw event
item.description: On August 18th, as per official channels, Binance announced that the C2C "Strict Selection" zone test has been successfully concluded and was officially launched today.To mark the third anniversary of the Shield Advertisers' launch, the platform also launched a limited-time event with zero transaction fees. Users can conduct secure transactions of digital assets in the "Strict Selection" zone and have the chance to participate in a lucky draw to win an iPhone 17.

item.title: Binance Alpha will list DecentralGPT (DGC) and open airdrop claims to eligible users
item.description: On August 18th, as per official channels, Binance Alpha is scheduled to list DecentralGPT (DGC) on August 20th. Once trading commences, eligible users will be able to claim the airdrop on the Alpha event page by using Binance Alpha points. Further details will be made public shortly.

item.title: Binance HODLer Airdrop Round 3 Featuring Solayer (LAYER) Has Launched
item.description: August 18th. According to the official announcement, Binance will now commence the third round of the HODLer airdrop as part of the 18,000,000 LAYER airdrop plan. 6,000,000 LAYER will be distributed during this third round of the HODLer airdrop. The airdrop distribution will be completed within 24 hours following the publication of this announcement.Eligible Users: Users who purchased the Principal-Protected Coin (Fixed and/or Flexible) or on-chain Staking Coin products by using BNB between 08:00 on July 20, 2025 (in UTC+8 time), and 07:59 on July 24, 2025 (in UTC+8 time) will be eligible for the airdrop allocation.

item.title: ZachXBT: WhiteRock Engineer Still Active on GitHub, Death Rumors Are False
item.description: On August 18th, the on-chain detective ZachXBT put up a post stating that the rumored "person who died from a missile attack" WhiteRock Finance engineer is currently still active on GitHub and Trello. He said sarcastically, "Apparently, he has come back to life. What a true miracle."Previously, it was reported that the founder of WhiteRock Finance, Ildar Ilham, was arrested in the UAE and accused of committing a $30 million fraud through ZKasino.

item.title: CoinShares: Digital Asset Investment Products See $3.75 Billion in Net Inflows Last Week
item.description: On August 18th, CoinShares released its latest weekly report indicating that digital asset investment products attracted a record-breaking $3.75 billion in inflows during the past week. This led to the total assets under management (AuM) reaching a historic high of $244 billion.Among them, Ethereum demonstrated the most prominent performance, with $2.87 billion in inflows (accounting for 77% of the total inflows). As a result, the year-to-date inflows for Ethereum reached $11 billion, which proportionally exceeded Bitcoin by a considerable margin.

item.title: During a market downturn, a certain whale spent $83.96 million to accumulate BTC and ETH in a single move
item.description: On August 18th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, during a market decline, a particular whale took an action by using 83.96 million USDC to purchase 10,000 ETH (approximately $43.43 million) and 350 BTC (approximately $40.53 million).
